code: @Override public BootstrapCheckResult check(BootstrapContext context) {     final Boolean httpsEnabled = XPackSettings.HTTP_SSL_ENABLED.get(context.settings()).     final Boolean apiKeyServiceEnabled = XPackSettings.API_KEY_SERVICE_ENABLED_SETTING.get(context.settings()).     if (httpsEnabled == false && apiKeyServiceEnabled) {         final String message = String.format(Locale.ROOT, "HTTPS is required in order to use the API key service. " + "please enable HTTPS using the [%s] setting or disable the API key service using the [%s] setting", XPackSettings.HTTP_SSL_ENABLED.getKey(), XPackSettings.API_KEY_SERVICE_ENABLED_SETTING.getKey()).         return BootstrapCheckResult.failure(message).     }     return BootstrapCheckResult.success(). }
